sentences.cn: “ 当然了! ” 她急忙插嘴道.

sentences.en: " I got dressed before luncheon,'said the child, turning eagerly to Daisy.
sentences.cn: “ 我在午饭前就打扮好了. ” 孩子说, 急切地把脸转向黛西.

sentences.en: "So what do you think will happen?" he asked eagerly.
sentences.cn: “那么你觉得会发生什么？”他急切地问道。

sentences.en: Amy watched the child's intent face eagerly, trying to fix it in her mind.
sentences.cn: 埃米急切地看着孩子那张神情专注的脸，想把它记在脑海里。

sentences.en: Five hundred pairs of eyes were fastened upon him eagerly.
sentences.cn: 五百双眼睛热切地盯着他.

sentences.en: He eagerly requested loan from the bank.
sentences.cn: 他迫切地要求银行给予贷款.

sentences.en: He eagerly snuffled a mouthful of smoke.
sentences.cn: 他急切贪婪地吸了一口烟。

sentences.en: Her latest novel is eagerly awaited.
sentences.cn: 人们正急切地期待着她的最新小说.

sentences.en: Lulled into a false sense of security, we eagerly awaited their return.
sentences.cn: 我们被一种虚假的安全感所麻痹，急切地等着他们回来。

sentences.en: Myself when young did eagerly frequent Doctor and Saint.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时的确热心于和圣贤经常来往.

sentences.en: She eagerly read every word, and asked me several questions about the people at the Grange.
sentences.cn: 她急切地读着每一个字，还问了我几个关于画眉山庄里的人的问题。

sentences.en: She is looking forward more and more eagerly to her son's holiday at home.
sentences.cn: 她眼巴巴地盼着儿子休假回家.

sentences.en: She leant forward eagerly to listen to him.
sentences.cn: 她急切地向前弯着腰听他说.

sentences.en: The President's visit is eagerly looked forward to.
sentences.cn: 人们热切地盼望总统来访.

sentences.en: The soldiers responded eagerly to the orders.
sentences.cn: 命令下达后战士热烈响应.

sentences.en: They peered eagerly at the door, where all must enter.
sentences.cn: 他们焦急地盯着门看, 他们全都得从那里进去.

sentences.en: We crowded round eagerly, but then felt disappointed.
sentences.cn: 我们都急切地围拢上去, 可都感到大失所望.
